about_the_game:
Comfort and Warmth is a sweet and spicy visual novel meant to capture the feeling of a caring relationship.

Step into the shoes of a woman in the early stages of a relationship with a man who's in it for the long haul. She might not have job security, benefits, or the respect of her bosses, but she does have a partner who'll support her through thick and thin. He'll lift her up when she's feeling down, and on her toughest days, he's always there to look after her.

Features

  • Nameable protagonist.

  • Choice-driven content, with player input not only over the flow of conversation, but explicit scenes. Determine the direction of the game's explicit content, or avoid it at will.

  • Roughly one hour of content per playthrough.

  • Hot chocolate for the soul.

content_descriptors.notes: Comfort and Warmth features depictions of consensual and enthusiastic sexual activities between the main characters. The contents of the scenes vary depending on player choice, and choices to avoid all sexual content are available.
